name: Coin Miners
description:
Two Little Miners has been captured by a horrible Stone-Giant.

The Stone-Giant wants gold coins!

Only one of the miner finding more gold coins can survive. The other will ...

Beat the other player and survive!

How to play:

one shoot of bullet takes 200 points. And it takes several seconds for it to reload.

You can steal coins from other player or shoot bullet to destroy their coins. Try It Out!

You can also find the source file on GitHub:   https://github.com/20001LastOrder/Two-Button-Game
